pro_course_detail.title: English for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description: This lesson is for adults and children. It is customized to the needs of beginners. It includes improving all 4 skills: speaking, listening, reading and writing. Customizing the lesson especially for you, we can focus on conversational practice, grammar or vocabulary. I will provide lessons using Cambridge and National Geographic materials and exercises. I will also provide homework and customized lesson plans for each student.

pro_course_detail.title: General English course B1, B2, C1
pro_course_detail.description: In this course, we will explore your personal goals for progress in the language and then work together on skills, grammar and vocabulary to help you fulfill those goals. These classes will be based on structured lesson plans. I will work systematically through grammar issues with you and give you homework.

pro_course_detail.title: English for children
pro_course_detail.description: The earlier you introduce a new language to your child the faster and easier they can pick it up. These lessons will focus on introducing English in a fun exciting way. We will talk, play games and sing songs.

pro_course_detail.title: 🇷🇺 Russian for beginners / Русский язык для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson is for children and adults. If you had never studied Russian, this course is perfect for you. Learning Russian can be interesting and fun! 
It includes improving all 4 skills: speaking, listening, reading and writing. Customizing the lesson especially for you, we can focus on conversational practice, grammar or vocabulary. I will also provide homework and customized lesson plans for each student.

pro_course_detail.title: 🇷🇺 Conversational Russian. Feedback A2 - C2
pro_course_detail.description:
Improving your Russian conversation is about having fun and discussing topics that interest you so that your language skills develop naturally. Please let me know your interests or a topic you have read about lately. Some examples could be:
- food and culture
- travel
- history
- sports
Through these lessons we will naturally draw out grammar, pronunciation and expand vocabulary, so your Russian develops and your confidence improves.

Совершенствовать разговорный русский язык это весело и интересно! Мы затронем интересующие вас темы, что позволит естественно и легко улучшить ваши разговорные навыки. Напишите мне что вас интересует или о чем вы недавно читали. Примерами тем могут быть:
еда и культура (как и культура еды)
история
спорт
На наших уроках мы улучшим вашу грамматику, произношение и расширим словарный запас что позволит вам разговаривать на русском языке легко и уверенно.

pro_course_detail.title: 🇷🇺 Russian for children

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I believe that communication in the classes plays a huge role. So, energy,  passion for learning, interesting topics are guaranteed from my side :) I will teach you the right pronunciation, interesting collocations, phrasal verbs to make sure you improve your speaking with me. 

Я уверена что коммуникация на уроках играет важную роль, поэтому энергия и энтузиазм с моей стороны обеспечен так же как интересные темы для уроков. Я обучу правильному Американскому произношению, интересным словосочитаниям и фразовым глаголам, чтобы убедиться в том, что навыки разговорной речи улучшаются, а ошибки корректируются.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My approach to teaching is simple and straightforward. I use guided discovery and conversational approaches. So, briefly, you speak a lot and participate in class activities a lot. I always have a proper plan for my lessons with detailed step-by-step activities. I use many engaging videos and recordings in classes and focus as much attention on natural speaking and listening as possible. 
Моя методика проста. Я использую современную методику "guided discovery" где студент занимает активную роль. В идеальном случае когда 70% говорит студент, а 30% преподаватель. Тогда у ученика будет возможность наговориться на Английском/Русском, а у меня возможность подправить и направить студента.

course_info.trial_description: A trial lessons will last 30 minutes and during this lesson we will get to know each other and exchange useful information to help us understand more about your English or Russian skills.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский для начального уровня
pro_course_detail.description: Основной уклон курса будет заключатся в изучении основ русского языка, то есть чтение алфавита, базовых слов, фраз. Будем учиться произношению, базовой грамматике и тд..

pro_course_detail.title: From BEGGINER TO ELEMENTARY FOR 150 HOURS!
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a beginner course for English learners, meaning that we will focus our attention on the basis of the basics. This course is for those who want to reach the Elementary level. 
I will guide you through the MOST important tenses of English, teach you sentence construction and order, prepositions, irregular verbs, and most importantly on a broad range of vocabulary necessary to talk at the basic level. So, be ready to study a lot with me :)

pro_course_detail.title: From ElEMENTARY TO INTERMEDIATE FOR 300 HOURS!
pro_course_detail.description: This is a more in-depth course where we will go over the variety of grammar structures to broaden your speaking opportunities. So, you will learn how to express yourself by speaking about short-term, long-term plans, future actions, past perfect. You will learn passive voice, active voice. All irregular verbs that will help you talk about general experience and facts using the Present Perfect. I will teach interesting phrasal verbs, collocations.

pro_course_detail.title: From INTERMEDIATE TO UPPER-INTERMEDIATE FOR FOR 6 MONTHS !
pro_course_detail.description:
This is the course for those who want to go much far from what they know now. This is the most interesting course because usually at the intermediate level, I can discuss a broad range of topics with my students and watch interesting videos to help us with listening skills and also with the ideas for conversational practice. So, here we change our attention to speak more and listen more. The course includes also grammar parts but 90% is on the conversations. 
However, we still can study the difficult grammar that can help us talk about unreal past, future in the past, all tenses with called " Perfect" will be covered as well. In addition, I prepare a list of high-level collocations and phrasal verbs for more advanced speakers of English.

teacher_info.intro: I am Tania - Russian girl who had decided to travel the world one day and settled down in Mexico after 6+ months of wandering. I live in a small town on the Pacific coast, I have 2 dogs and I believe the education can change the world
teacher_info.introduction: I studied in different countries and kinds of educating organisations from uni to private courses, and I suppose I've developed my own approach. I also teach teachers to teach at a language center, so I'm quite skilled. I think speaking practice is an underestimated part of language, and I love holding discussions and push those reluctant to speak by games and other entertaining stuff. I also hate doing grammar classes with no use, I prefer the inductive comprehension. Although I've good practice in teaching languages foreign to me (which is so much easier - I learned them too and I know your difficulties) I'm eager to try Russian - it's a harsh language, but somehow people learn it and speak it, so Let's try!

teacher_info.intro:
Hello!
I'm Julia.
I'm a friendly and communicative person and a very supportive teacher. Patience and creativity are two of my best qualities.
I enjoy music, fashion, cooking, and am very fond of reading, particularly foreign literature. I love traveling, meeting new people, and learning about different cultures. So, I believe we have a lot in common to discuss during our lessons.
teacher_info.short_signature: Your best teacher with 10 years of teaching experience
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello!
I'm Julia.
I'm a friendly and communicative person and a very supportive teacher. Patience and creativity are two of my best qualities.
I enjoy music, fashion, cooking, and am very fond of reading, particularly foreign literature. I love traveling, meeting new people, and learning about different cultures. So, I believe we have a lot in common to discuss during our lessons.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have a Bachelor's Degree in English Philology and Pedagogics. I have 10 years of experience in teaching English. Through my teaching experience and university studies, I developed critical pedagogic and classroom management skills, along with a passion for teaching.
I can help you if you are a complete beginner or if you are more advanced and simply want to improve your English and Russian fluency.
I aim to make education as enjoyable as possible to help my students achieve their language learning goals.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My teaching style can be best described as interactive, imaginative, supportive, flexible, and of course, communicative. I apply these methods through interactive, student-centered activities that maximize "student talk time".
I plan and design my lessons around my students' needs and interests. It can be a conversation class with a variety of interesting topics, real-life situations, and role-playing, or can be a more structured, grammar-centered class including a wide range of activities.
I am committed to providing my students with the best knowledge possible by creating an enjoyable, inviting, and dynamic learning environment in my lessons.

exp_info.description:
I worked as a volunteer in a charity non-governmental organization World Vision Armenia.
I cooperated with foreign volunteers with whom we were making English speaking clubs for children.

Private English teacher for children and adults. Students' English exam preparation, conversational practice, school program support. Working in groups and one on one. Working with children from 2-nd to 11 grades and students from colleges and universities.
Online English teacher for adult students of beginner, intermediate and advanced levels.

cert_info.description: Successful participation to French langueage course.

One month teachers training with taking part in different workshops and webinars devoted to discipline issues, students need analysis, methodology, case studies in online teaching, etc.
This course gave me а great methodological support and new approaches in online teaching.

teacher_info.introduction:
Bonjour. Je  m'appelle Olga. Je suis professeur de russe. Ma langue maternelle est le russe ; autant dire que je communique dans cette langue depuis longtemps. Cela veut dire que je comprends les autres et que les autres peuvent me comprendre. Je serai ravie de vous enseigner la même chose : vous pourrez comprendre et parler la langue russe. 
 Je vous attends.

Здравствуйте. Меня зовут Ольга. Я дипломированный учитель французского языка. Я с удовольствием помогу выучить вам французский язык с любого уровня до свободного владения (Débutant, Pre-Intermediair, Intermediaire, Intermediaire-Superieur, Pré-avancé, Avancé , Avancé-Superieur  (А1-С2). 
	 Для обучения французскому языку я использую аутентичные ресурсы. Это учебники,  -аудио и видеоматериалы. Возможна подготовка к экзаменам DELF - DALF.   Итак, если вы хотите изучать французский язык со мной, и предпочитаете методы, адаптированные к вашим темпам, вашим личным способностям и желаниям, пожалуйста, свяжитесь со мной. Я Вас жду.

Hallo. Mein Name ist Olga. Ich bin zertifizierter Russischlehrerin. Meine Muttersprache ist Russisch. Ich werde glücklich sein, Ihnen zu helfen, diese schöne Sprache zu lernen. Sie werden die russische Sprache verstehen und sprechen und vielleicht in dieser Sprache denken.  Ich warte auf Sie.

Hallo. My name is Olga. I’m a teacher of Russian. Russian is my native language.  And even though my English is now [presently] a very little, I have a big experience to teach my native language on an other languages, for exemple, on the French. 
I use to teach only authentic resources. This is tutorials, audio and video content. It contributes to a rapid immersion in the Russian-speaking atmosphere.   So, if you want to learn Russian with me and prefer methods that are adapted to your pace and your personal capacity, contact me, please .. Or just want to discuss various topics in Russian, please contact me. I am waiting for you.

pro_course_detail.title: Le russe pour tous
pro_course_detail.description: Bonjour à tous. Je suis  Olga.  Je serais très ravie d' aider à l'apprentissage  du russe (j'ai un certificat de l'obtention de l'institut pédagogique, la faculté de les langes étrangère y compris la langue russe). Si vous avez besoin d'apprendre une langue dans un domaine particulier (voyage, droit, agriculture), je suis sûr que je vais tenir compte de vos souhaits. Dans le processus d'apprentissage non formel touchera sur de nombreux sujets intéressants. Je vais vous aider à vous familiariser avec la culture russe, les traditions et la mentalité. Contactez-moi, s' il vous plais, choisissez le bon moment dans le grill d' horaire . Je vous attends.

teacher_info.intro: Hello, my prospective students. I want to thank you for showing interest in my profile on italki. I have been teaching on italki since January 2020. teacher_info.about_teacher:
I can offer individual / pair / group classes of English or Russian for students of all levels!  If you are a beginner, we are going to start from scratch that is with the alphabet, phonetics, reading, listening and writing skills, some basic grammar and lexics. If you are more advanced we will improve your speaking and listening skills and master the language. My job is to teach my students how to express themselves freely in English and Russian with preserving their individuality and style, instilling in them a language instinct to keep up with the times.

Поэтому я приглашаю вас присоединиться к моей команде и насладится этим увлекательным путешествием в мир языков!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
As a teacher of English I offer classes on the method of "intensive immersion in English" with a  communicative bias. I will acquaint you with the system of  English and make you involved into various activities (making comments on different issues, having discussions, writing essays, enlarging vocabulary) to boost conversation. I set an authntic British standard accent and fluency of speech. 
As a teacher of Russian I will immerse you in the original culture of Russia and teach you how to communicate, read and write in one of the most beautiful languages of the world. We will discuss Russian literature to understand our "mysterious Russian soul". So I am looking forward to meeting you soon!

teacher_info.about_teacher:

✅ my goal is to help you master the Russian language, 
✅ your learning environment in class is warm and friendly,

✅ you understand all the Russian language I use and all the rules I explain, 
✅ you feel free to ask any questions,
✅ you feel improvement after each class, 
✅ the mediator language is eventually fading away.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
🤗 For now I am preferably focused on teaching General Russian to adult absolute beginners or false beginners.
📖 I offer you  a course of enjoyable structured lessons, after which you can commmunicate in everyday life.
💯 I will provide you with a proven curriculum, clear explanations, engaging tasks, much patience and support.
🗣️ I make sure my students learn at their own pace, achieving their goals.

😊 Book a trial lesson. Time to learn Russian!

course_info.trial_description:
Hello, all!
At this lesson you are welcome to ask any questions about me, my teaching, my materials, the method I use, the time it takes to reach the first breakthrough, etc.
If you are a complete beginner, we will start with the alphabet and reading.
If you have already started learning Russian before, I will ask you some questions to find out  what you can for now and how I can help you.
Looking forward to meeting you!

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian for Beginners ( For 0-A1 Adults and Young Adults)
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's build the proper foundation!

As a beginner you need a good start. 
First, if necessary, a short phonetic course with reading rules.
Then we will work step by step on all aspects of the Russian language (reading, listening, writing, speaking).
The key to your success is the special order of the materials, short and clear explanations, loads of practice.
All materials are very authentic and it makes you feel the language from the very beginning.

Looking forward to meeting you!

pro_course_detail.title: Confident Elementary Level, General Russian (For A1+ Adults and Young Adults)
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's make the first breakthrough!

These lessons are for learners who've already got used to "no fixed word order in a sentence" and "Меня зовут..." structure, for those who enjoy "у меня" and "куда?"  concepts and easily choose between "ходить/идти" and "ездить/ехать".
We are going to master the boosting and doubling your Russian communicative abilities Genitive Case and the most challenging thing - Verbal Aspect.
Vocabulary enrichment and speech skills improvement go without saying.

Looking forward to seeing you!

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Conversations (For A1-C2 Adults and Young Adults)
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's talk!

This lesson is your space to try and practise what you can in Russian for now. I am a native at this lesson  and NOT a TEACHER, there will be no structured explanations.
I have a nice cup of tea and I am all ears. I am interested in everything and ready to keep up the conversation. 
The steering wheel is YOURS.  You choose a topic and pace. Bring something for us to see/read/watch and discuss. Share your news and thoughts, ask questions.
Suitable for all levels.

Looking forward to our conversations!
